questions.getQuestion: SELECT questions.question, questions.answer, question_log.ask_time FROM question_log INNER JOIN questions ON question_log.question_id = questions.id WHERE question_log.id = $1 LIMIT 1
questions.getLatestQuestion: SELECT questions.question, questions.answer, question_log.ask_time FROM question_log INNER JOIN questions ON question_log.question_id = questions.id ORDER BY question_log.id DESC LIMIT 1

scores.getScore: SELECT SUM (points) AS total FROM score_log WHERE user_id = $1
scores.getScores: SELECT users.username,SUM(score_log.points) AS total FROM users, score_log WHERE users.user_id = score_log.user_id GROUP BY score_log.user_id ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2
scores.insertScore: INSERT INTO score_log (user_id, question_id, points) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
